pl.edu.pw.elka.proz.projekt1

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.pw.elka.proz.projekt1.Environment

  • public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of Environment class. The class represents environment in application and manages its users. The non-parameterized constructor has been omitted, as the environment can not exist without a name, which is its unique identifier.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Konrad Bereda
